page.title: About Us
page.subtitle: Your trusted technical partner for building digital presence in the GCC market. We combine deep technical expertise with understanding of local market needs.

corePhilosophy.title: Technical Excellence.
corePhilosophy.description: We believe digital success requires more than just a website. It requires a true partnership with a team that understands your vision and leverages modern technologies to achieve your goals.

quality.title: Zero-Compromise Quality
quality.description: We use the latest technologies and best practices in every project. Quality of work is our identity.

partnership.title: True Partnership
partnership.description: We work as a strategic partner, not just a vendor. Your success is our success.

growth.title: Continuous Growth
growth.description: We build platforms that scale and grow with your business. We look to the future.

t1.name: Yussef Makhlouf
t1.bio: Technical project management expert ensuring on-time delivery. Ensures client satisfaction and quality execution.

t2.name: Eslam Hussein
t2.bio: Software engineering specialist building scalable systems. Extensive experience in Node.js and MongoDB.

t3.name: Mohamed Hosny
t3.bio: Web development expert with years of experience building digital platforms for the GCC market. Specialized in Next.js and React.

t4.name: Mahmoud Taha
t4.bio: Specializes in turning technical visions into successful strategies. Bridges technology and business objectives.

t5.name: Momen Ahmed
t5.bio: Experience in modern user interface and exceptional user experience design. Combines beauty with functionality.

t6.name: mohamed Fahmy
t6.bio: Sales and business development expert with a focus on the GCC market. Dedicated to building strong client partnerships and driving digital growth.

tech.title: Deep Technical Expertise
tech.description: We use Next.js, React, and Node.js to build advanced platforms.

market.title: GCC Market Understanding
market.description: We understand Saudi, UAE, and Kuwait market needs.

support.title: Ongoing Support
support.description: We stay with you after launch to ensure your continued success.

results.title: Measurable Results
results.description: We measure our success by your digital goals achievement.

2015.title: Foundation
2015.description: OPTIMA was founded with a vision to transform digital presence in the GCC region, starting as a small team of passionate developers.

2018.title: Regional Expansion
2018.description: Expanded operations across the GCC, serving clients in Saudi Arabia, UAE, Kuwait, and Qatar with innovative web solutions.

2021.title: Technology Leader
2021.description: Recognized as a leading digital agency in the region, delivering 100+ successful projects for enterprise clients.

2024.title: Market Dominance
2024.description: Continuing to innovate with cutting-edge technologies, serving 50+ clients across 15+ industries in the GCC market.

skills.title: Technical
skills.description: Our team combines years of experience with cutting-edge technologies to deliver exceptional digital solutions that drive business growth.

cta.title: Ready to
cta.titleSuffix: Let's build your digital success together
